net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm.xml
Class DefaultArgTypeConverterJ2se

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm.xml.DefaultArgTypeConverterJ2se
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArgTypeConverter
public class DefaultArgTypeConverterJ2se
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArgTypeConverter

An ArgTypeConverter that implements conversion support for the core data types when running on J2SE.
The types supported by this class are (first is the type name, 2nd is the class name):

  • location - LocationJ2se
  • float - Float64J2se
  • floatArray - Float64J2se[]

See Also:
ArgTypeConverter
